title: Super Girls (Hong Kong group)
text:
Super Girls also known as Icon Girls, were a Hong Kong Cantopop girl group formed by Stars Shine International. They are managed by Jam Cast Management HK Ltd. The group has five members: Aka Chio, Heidi Lee, Yanny Chan, Cheronna Ng, and Jessica Tsoi. They disbanded in February 2022.
